con:testCase.name: TestCase1: return courses from DB
TestCase2: return resourses from DB
TestCase1: return all courses (200 OK)
TestCase2: return all courses (404 not found)
TestCase3: create a course

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
log.info("START Test")
//def responseMessage = testRunner.testCase.testSteps[""].testRequest.response.contentAsString def responseMessage = context.response assert responseMessage != null : "Response message equals null" log.info("tested response message passed " + responseMessage)
def jsonSlurper = new JsonSlurper() def jsonResponse = jsonSlurper.parseText(responseMessage)
def id = jsonResponse._id
log.info(id)
context.setProperty("course_id", id)
log.info("FINISH with id:" + context.getProperty("course_id"))

con:testCase.name: TestCase4: validation "Year" field is required
TestCase5: validation "Semester" field is required
TestCase6: validation "Title" field is required
TestCase7: create a course (404 not found)
TestCase8: return a course by a valid id

log.info(id)

con:testCase.name: TestCase9: return a course by an invalid id (because the number of characters)

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
log.info("START Test")
context.setProperty("course_id", "5c378fae73d5db3")
log.info("FINISH with id:" + context.getProperty("course_id"))

con:testCase.name: TestCase10: return a course by a non-existent id in DB

con:config.script:

log.info("START Test")
context.setProperty("course_id", "5c378fae73d5db3600ffffff")
log.info("FINISH with id:" + context.getProperty("course_id"))
